name: Pankhuri Thakur

education.institution: Bennett University – Greater Noida, UP, India

projects.name: Kidney Stone Detection
details: Leveraged the YOLOv9 model to accurately detect and localize kidney stones in medical imaging, achieving a detection accuracy of 64% by training on a manually annotated dataset using Roboflow.
Utilized OpenCV for image preprocessing and augmentation to enhance model performance and generalizability.
Currently preparing a research paper detailing the methodology, results, and potential clinical implications for submission to medical imaging conferences/journals.

projects.name: Image Captioning Project
details: Combined EfficientNet for image feature extraction and RoBERTa for caption generation, producing high-quality captions.
Implemented a training and testing pipeline, including data preprocessing and evaluation with BLEU and METEOR scores.
Optimized model performance, reducing training time and improving inference speed through fine-tuning.

projects.name: AstroChat
details: Developed an Astronomical Chat Bot that answers astronomical queries, achieving an 87.4% accuracy in responses by fine-tuning the T5 model on our own question and answer dataset.
Built a user-friendly webpage with FastAPI, Svelte, and Uvicorn.
Currently working on a research paper for the same for future conferences/journals.

projects.name: Whisper
details: Developed an advanced sentiment analysis model using Python and Google BERT, achieving an 89.6% accuracy in sentiment analysis across diverse text sources.
Managed data preprocessing, enhancing data quality through cleaning, tokenization, and feature engineering, resulting in a 40% increase in model accuracy.
Created a responsive web-based sentiment analysis platform with FastAPI.
